p: Comparing the weight loss with the results gained from the gel tablets kept in refrigerator (PBR, Figure 2C), the G0 gel tablets lost over 33% of mass and the other samples lost less than 18% of their weight (tablets which have essential oil or ethanol in their composition lost more than 10% of their content). It was observed that glycerol attracted moisture to the gel tablets, but no correlation was found between the study duration and weight change, some weight variations were determined in 7–14 days interval, others—14–28 days.
